description.english:
You broke the shop, but it's not a bug (well, it is one that has been made a feature).
Triggering this bug disables Achievements, Leaderboards and reduces Soulcoins gain by 90%.
description.french:
Vous avez casser le marchand, Ce n'est pas un bug (Enfin, un peu)
Activer ce bug désactive les succès, le leaderboard et réduit le gain de pièce d'âme de 90%
description.schinese:
你把商店搞崩了，但这并不是BUG（好吧，这是故意添加的功能）
触发此BUG后，本局游戏将禁用成就与排行榜，且灵魂币获取降低90%。
description.spanish:
Has roto la tienda, pero no es un error (en realidad lo es, pero ahora es una opción)
Al provocar este error, se desactivarán los logros y el ascenso en la clasificación, y se reducirá tu ganancia de monedas de almas en un 90 %
description.turkish:
You broke the shop, but it's not a bug (well, it is one made a feature)
Triggering this bug disable achievements, leaderboard and reduce soul-coin gain by 90%
description.russian:
You broke the shop, but it's not a bug (well, it is one made a feature)
Triggering this bug disable achievements, leaderboard and reduce soul-coin gain by 90%
description.german:
Du hast den Shop kaputt gemacht, aber es ist kein Bug (Naja, es ist einer, der zu einem Feature gemacht wurde)
Wenn dieser Bug ausgelöst wird, werden die Erfolge und die Bestenliste deaktiviert und der Seelensteingewinn um 90% reduziert.
description.koreana:
상점을 망가뜨렸지만, 이는 버그가 아닙니다(사실, 기능으로 만들어진 버그입니다).
이 버그를 유발하면 업적, 리더보드가 비활성화되고 영혼코인 획득량이 90% 감소합니다.
description.brazilian:
Você quebrou a Loja, mas não é um bug (bem, é um bug que se tornou um recurso agora).
Acionar este bug desativa Conquistas, placar e reduz o ganho de Moedas D'Alma em 90%.
description.japanese:
ショップをめちゃくちゃにしましたね？バグではないのでご安心を。
（実績やスコアは無効。獲得ソウルコインが 90％ ダウン）

description.portuguese:
You broke the shop, but it's not a bug (well, it is one that has been made a feature)
Triggering this bug disables achievements, leaderboards and reduces soul-coin gain by 90%

Anda merusak toko, tapi itu bukan bug (ya, ini adalah bug yang telah dijadikan fitur)
Memicu bug ini menonaktifkan pencapaian, leaderboard dan mengurangi keuntungan koin-jiwa sebesar 90%

你把商店搞崩了，但這並不是BUG（好吧，這是故意添加的功能）

description.english:
Reach 90 Corruption from altars during a boss stage and kill the boss.
When this happens it doubles your Corruption for the rest of the run and increases your Soulcoins gain by 15%.
description.german:
Erreiche 90 Verderbnis von Altären, und töte dann den Endgegner.
Wenn dies geschieht, verdopple deine Verderbnis für den Rest des Laufs und erhöhe deinen Seelenmünzengewinn um 15%.
description.french:
Atteindre 90 de corruption due au autels pendant un stage boss et tuer le boss
Quand vous atteignez cette valeur, vous doublez corruption pendant le reste de la partie et gagner 15% de pièce d'âme en plus
description.italian:
Reach 90 corruption from altars during a boss stage and kill the boss
When this happens it doubles your corruption for the rest of the run and increases your soul-coin gain by 15%
description.koreana:
보스 단계에서 제단으로 90 부패에 도달하고 보스를 처치하다.
이 경우 나머지 실행 동안 부패가 두 배로 증가하고 영혼코인 획득량이 15% 증가합니다.
description.spanish:
Llega a nivel 90 de corrupción con altares durante una pelea con un jefe, y derrota al jefe.
Cuando esto ocurra, tu corrupción se duplicará durante el resto de la partida, pero aumentará tu ganancia de monedas de almas en un 15%.
description.schinese:
在首领关卡中，在祭坛处达到90点腐化，并击杀首领。
完成后，本局游戏腐化翻倍，且灵魂币获取提升15%。
description.tchinese:
在首領關卡中，在祭壇處達到90點腐化，並擊殺首領。
完成後，本局遊戲腐化翻倍，且靈魂幣獲取提升15%。
description.russian: Достигните 90 Порчи с алтарей во время битвы с боссом и убейте босса. Выполнив эти условия ваша Порча удваивается до конца забега и увеличивается прирост монет душ на 15%.
description.thai:
Reach 90 corruption from altars during a boss stage and kill the boss
When this happens it doubles your corruption for the rest of the run and increases your soul-coin gain by 15%
description.japanese:
ボスのステージ中、祭壇の腐敗値が 90 に達した状態でボスを倒す。
（成功すると、以降の自分の腐敗値が 2倍 になり、獲得ソウルコインが 15％ アップ）

description.english: Requires you to unlock these achievements: Got any more of them Soul-gems?, I eat 66 times a day to get in good shape, This gold is the solution to all my problems, Getting personal with my enemies is part of my strategy, Elites and champions are nothing to me, Why should I move to grab experience? & Crates never give me what I want!
description.german: Benötigt diese anderen Errungenschaften freigeschaltet: Habt ihr noch mehr davon? (Seelen-Edelsteine), Ich esse 66 Mal am Tag, um in guter Form zu sein, Gold ist die Lösung für alle meine Probleme, Enge Begegnungen mit meinem Feind sind Teil meiner Strategie, Elite und Champions sind nichts für mich, Warum sollte ich mich bewegen, um Erfahrung zu sammeln? & Kisten geben mir nie was ich will!
description.french: Requires to unlock achievements: Vous en avez plus ? Des gemmes d'âme, Je mange 66 fois par jour pour être en bonne santé, Cet or est la solution à tous mes problèmes, Le contact avec mes ennemis fait partie de ma stratégie, Les élites et les champions ne sont rien pour moi, Pourquoi devrais-je bouger pour ramasser tout l'expérience ? & Les caisses ne me donnent jamais ce que je veux !
description.italian: Requires you to unlock these achievements: Got any more of them Soul-gems?, I eat 66 times a day to get in good shape, This gold is the solution to all my problems, Getting personal with my enemies is part of my strategy, Elites and champions are nothing to me, Why should I move to grab experience? & Crates never give me what I want!
description.koreana: 이 업적을 잠금 해제해야 합니다: 소울 보석 더 있니?, 좋은 몸매를 위해 하루 66번 먹어, 이 금이 내 모든 문제의 해결책, 적들과의 개인적인 접촉은 내 전략의 일부, 엘리트와 챔피언은 나에게 아무것도 아니다, 경험치를 얻기 위해 왜 움직여야 해? & 상자들은 내가 원하는 것을 절대 주지 않아!
description.spanish: Necesitas desbloquear estos logros: ¿Tienes mas de esas Gemas de Alma?, Yo como 66 veces al dia para estar en buena forma, Este oro es la solucion a todos mis problemas, Acercarme a mis enemigos es parte de mi estrategia, Elites y campeones no son nada para mi, ¿Por que debo moverme para obtener experiencia? & Las cajas nunca me dan lo que quiero
description.schinese: 成就解锁前置条件：有更多灵魂宝石吗？, 为保持体型我一天吃66顿, 金钱能解决一切问题, 对敌人要像秋风扫落叶, 在座的精英和头目都是垃圾, 为啥还要去拣经验？ & 木箱里根本没有惊喜！
description.tchinese: 成就解鎖前置條件：有更多靈魂寶石嗎？, 為保持體型我一天吃66頓, 金錢能解決一切問題, 對敵人要像秋風掃落葉, 在座的精英和頭目都是垃圾, 為啥還要去揀經驗？ & 木箱裡根本沒有驚喜！
description.russian: Requires to unlock achievements: Do you have any more of this? Soul-gems, I eat 66 time a day to get in good shape, Золото - решение всех проблем, Getting personnal with my enemy is part of my strategy, Elite and champions are nothing to me, Зачем мне лишние телодвижения для получения опыта? & Crate never give me what I want!
description.thai: Requires you to unlock these achievements: Got any more of them Soul-gems?, I eat 66 times a day to get in good shape, This gold is the solution to all my problems, Getting personal with my enemies is part of my strategy, Elites and champions are nothing to me, Why should I move to grab experience? & Crates never give me what I want!
description.japanese: 以下の実績を解除する :「ソウルジェム　まだ拾う？, 一日に66回も食べちゃうよ, 金がすべてを解決する, 敵に近づくのも戦略のうち, エリートなんて取るに足りない, 経験値のために動く必要なし & もう木箱には期待しない！」
